column5: My place is close to restaurants and dining and family-friendly activities. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the neighborhood, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The Heights is such a great community and the bike path goes on for miles, you can walk to great restaurants or parks. This place is a 10 minute drive to Downtown Houston. Also convenient access to Katy Fwy (I-10). Easily get to the Galleria area in 10 minutes.
